column1: 15:58|Punctuality is an obsession with the Japanese
column2: so Anna was not surprised when a smartly dressed lady appeared at two minutes to four
column4: and invited Anna to follow her. She too looked at the wooden box
column5: but showed no reaction other than to ask
column6: “Would you like it to be taken to the chairman’s office?”|False Impression|Jeffrey Archer

column1: 15:58|A hum of tolling bells makes itself heard
column2: but not sharply. At three-fifty-eight a waiting interval. Presently a long procession of gentlemen in evening dress comes in sight and approaches until it is near to the square
column3: then falls back against the wall of soldiers at the sidewalk
column4: and the white shirt-fronts show like snowflakes and are very conspicuous where so much warm color is all about.|The Memorable Assassination|Mark Twain
